## Description {#details}

A simple RAII based Observer installer.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> this in a scope to install the Observer to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> and reset it at the end of the scope.

Definition at line 144 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/giselchangeobserver-h">GISelChangeObserver.h</a>.
